title: Information: At a Restaurant (Usefulness 5-10)
description: Traveler usefulness 5-10/10 phrases for the At a Restaurant subcategory within Information. Includes 2 card(s).

cards.english: Do you have an English menu?
cards.romaji: Eigo no menyu wa arimasu ka?
cards.japanese: 英語のメニューはありますか？

cards.english: Can you give me an English menu?
cards.japanese: 英語のメニューをください。
